refnamediv.refpurpose: Function to extract a sequence of default grapheme clusters from a UTF-8 text buffer, limited by a character count

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Procedural style
stringgrapheme_extractc stringhaystack intcsize intstart
Function to extract a sequence of default grapheme clusters from a UTF-8 text buffer, limited by a character count.

&reftitle.parameters;
haystack
String to search.
csize
Maximum number of UTF-8 characters to return.
start
Starting position in $haystack in bytes. If given, it must be zero or a positive value that is less than or equal to the length of $haystack in bytes. The default is zero. If $start does not point to the first byte of a UTF-8 character, the start position is moved to the next character boundary.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
A string starting at offset $start containing no more than $csize characters and ending on a default grapheme cluster boundary.
